quotes_occasions.quote_02: Do something today that your future self will thank you for.

quotes_occasions.quote_01: The most important thing is to enjoy your life—to be happy—it’s all that matters.
quotes_occasions.quote_02: Happiness is when what you think, what you say, and what you do are in harmony.

quotes_occasions.quote_01: You can't fly unless you let yourself fall
quotes_occasions.quote_02: Gratitude is a choice. We can choose to be grateful.

quotes_occasions.quote_01: Love does not dominate; it cultivates.
quotes_occasions.quote_02: If you want to change the world, go home and love your family.

quotes_occasions.quote_01: Never burn bridges. Today's junior jerk, tomorrow's senior partner.
quotes_occasions.quote_02: Joy is not in things; it is in us.

quotes_occasions.quote_01: We acquire the strength we have overcome.
quotes_occasions.quote_02: Family always gonna be there. The material things, they come and go.

quotes_occasions.quote_01: There are moments that have a certain flavor of eternity
quotes_occasions.quote_02: The best things in life are the people we love.

quotes_occasions.quote_01: Failure is not the opposite of success; it's part of success.
quotes_occasions.quote_02: There are those who give with joy, and that joy is their reward.

quotes_occasions.quote_01: Strength does not come from physical capacity. It comes from an indomitable will.

quotes_occasions.quote_02: A heart full of joy is better than a hand full of coins.

quotes_occasions.quote_01: I like criticism. It makes you strong.
quotes_occasions.quote_02: Failure will never overtake me if my determination to succeed is strong enough.

quotes_occasions.quote_01: The greatest test of courage on the earth is to bear defeat without losing heart.
quotes_occasions.quote_02: Concentration is the secret of strength.

quotes_occasions.quote_01: You can’t really be strong until you can see a funny side to things.

quotes_occasions.quote_02: Sometimes you just need to go off the grid and get your soul right.

quotes_occasions.quote_01: Hope is such a bait, it covers any hook.
quotes_occasions.quote_02: There are far better things ahead than any we leave behind.

quotes_occasions.quote_01: If you obey all the rules you miss all the fun.
quotes_occasions.quote_02: Every next level of your life will demand a different you.

quotes_occasions.quote_01: You can only have bliss if you don’t chase it.
quotes_occasions.quote_02: The memories we make with our family is everything.

quotes_occasions.quote_01: A mind is like a parachute. It doesn't work if it is not open.
quotes_occasions.quote_02: Live each day as if your life had just begun.

quotes_occasions.quote_01: From what we get, we can make a living; what we give, however, makes a life.
quotes_occasions.quote_02: If not us, who? If not now, when?

quotes_occasions.quote_01: Education costs money. But then so does ignorance.
quotes_occasions.quote_02: Inspiration does exist, but it must find you working.

quotes_occasions.quote_01: Speak less than you know; have more than you show.
quotes_occasions.quote_02: Every noble work is at first impossible.

quotes_occasions.quote_01: Life is a long lesson in humility.
quotes_occasions.quote_02: Show up, show up, show up, and after a while the muse shows up, too.

quotes_occasions.quote_01: A person doesn’t have to be perfect to be exactly what you need.
quotes_occasions.quote_02: Don't bunt. Aim out of the ballpark. Aim for the company of immortals.

quotes_occasions.quote_01: How old would you be if you didn't know how old you are?
quotes_occasions.quote_02: I have stood on a mountain of no’s for one yes.

quotes_occasions.quote_01: It's not good to be lit all the time and have no clear-headed thoughts.
quotes_occasions.quote_02: Just move on, you’ll be better off in the long run.

quotes_occasions.quote_01: People have confused playing devil's advocate with being intelligent.
quotes_occasions.quote_02: The best way out is always through.

quotes_occasions.quote_01: When you struggle with a problem, that's when you understand it.
quotes_occasions.quote_02: Sometimes what you’re looking for comes when you’re not looking at all.

quotes_occasions.quote_01: Even when I was close to defeat I rose to my feet
quotes_occasions.quote_02: If there is no struggle, there is no progress.

quotes_occasions.quote_01: Innovation is serendipity, so you don't know what people will make.
quotes_occasions.quote_02: Courage is like a muscle. We strengthen it by use.

quotes_occasions.quote_01: No matter how long it takes, it will get better.
quotes_occasions.quote_02: Some people will better your life by being in it, while others will better it by staying out.

quotes_occasions.quote_01: Never let a bad situation bring out the worst in you. Choose to stay positive and be strong.
quotes_occasions.quote_02: Remember how blessed you are to see another day.

quotes_occasions.quote_01: The impossible exists only until we find a way to make it possible
quotes_occasions.quote_02: More is lost by indecision than wrong decision.

quotes_occasions.quote_01: Don’t rush and never settle. If it’s meant to be, it will be.
quotes_occasions.quote_02: How you make others feel about themselves, says a lot about you.

quotes_occasions.quote_01: Silence - not dissent - is the one answer that leaders should refuse to accept.
quotes_occasions.quote_02: Keep a little fire burning; however small, however hidden.

quotes_occasions.quote_01: You pray for the hungry. Then you feed them. That's how prayer works.
quotes_occasions.quote_02: I may not be where I need to be but I thank God I am not where I used to be!

quotes_occasions.quote_01: If you still talk about it, you still care about it.
quotes_occasions.quote_02: Worry is a misuse of imagination.

quotes_occasions.quote_02: Don’t judge someone’s choices without first knowing their reason.

quotes_occasions.quote_01: Sometimes, carrying on, just carrying on, is the superhuman achievement.
quotes_occasions.quote_02: I never look back, darling. It distracts from the now.

quotes_occasions.quote_01: If you want to change who you are, you have to change what you do.
quotes_occasions.quote_02: A year from now you will wish you had started today.

quotes_occasions.quote_01: The only thing worse than being blind is having sight but no vision.
quotes_occasions.quote_02: No other animal knows the difference between Friday and Monday.

quotes_occasions.quote_01: Look forward with hope, not backwards with regret.

quotes_occasions.quote_01: If you’re struggling, that means you’re progressing.
quotes_occasions.quote_02: Don’t worry about failure; you only have to be right once.

quotes_occasions.quote_01: When you value people, you give them freedom.
quotes_occasions.quote_02: You carry the passport to your own happiness.

quotes_occasions.quote_01: You know what lasts longer than beauty? Being smart.

quotes_occasions.quote_01: Don't worry about failure; you only have to be right once.
quotes_occasions.quote_02: The most difficult thing is the decision to act, the rest is merely tenacity.

quotes_occasions.quote_01: Aspire to inspire before you expire.
quotes_occasions.quote_02: I’d rather regret the things I’ve done than regret the things I haven’t done.

quotes_occasions.quote_01: Protect your spirit from contamination. Limit your time with negative people.
quotes_occasions.quote_02: A girl should be like a butterfly, pretty to see and hard to catch.

quotes_occasions.quote_01: Money is plentiful for those who understand the simple laws which govern its acquisition.
quotes_occasions.quote_02: I do not try to dance better than anyone else. I only try to dance better than myself.

quotes_occasions.quote_01: We all die. The goal isn’t to live forever, the goal is to create something that will.
quotes_occasions.quote_02: If you don’t risk anything, you risk even more.

quotes_occasions.quote_02: I think it’s intoxicating when somebody is so unapologetically who they are.

quotes_occasions.quote_01: Better to be king for a night than a schmuck for a lifetime.
quotes_occasions.quote_02: You can never leave footprints that last if you are always walking on tiptoe.

quotes_occasions.quote_01: If you give up at the first sign of struggle, you're really not ready to be successful.
quotes_occasions.quote_02: If you don’t like the road you’re walking, start paving another one.

quotes_occasions.quote_01: You can't achieve anything in life without a small amount of sacrifice.
quotes_occasions.quote_02: If it makes you nervous, you’re doing it right.

quotes_occasions.quote_01: Men with good intentions make promises. Men with good character keep them.
quotes_occasions.quote_02: We’re stronger in the places that we’ve been broken.

quotes_occasions.quote_01: You should never have to think twice about who your real friends are.
quotes_occasions.quote_02: I choose to make the rest of my life the best of my life.

quotes_occasions.quote_01: It's not in the dreaming, it's in the doing.
quotes_occasions.quote_02: In order to be irreplaceable one must always be different.
